author: Joanna King
comment: It took me a few minutes to get it, but once I did, it works & looks great

author: Amy Haines
comment: Did updates, ensured both devices on same network, Uninstaller and reinstalled twice, nothing is working.  It will be great I am sure once u get to use it. So far, paid over a dollar for nothing.

reply.author: SimplesApps
reply.content:
Hello Amy.

First of all thank you for download my Christmas Watch Faces app.
You have to install it through the Android Wear.
After installing the app you could select between the 3 packs ("Christmas Mix", "Christmas Trees" and "Christmas Balls").

Please, you could send an email with the issue to support@simplesapps.com in order to analyze it.

title: Unable to load onto watch

author: Bad Fish
comment: **** Unfortunately the unsightly lock is no deal for me, refunded, it's a watch face, not a home screen----Sorry probz a dumb Question, what's with the lock on the watch face??

reply.author: SimplesApps
reply.content: Hello Nick, the app uses the interactive functionality to change the watch face tapping anywhere in the screen except in the padlock. Every pack contains many different watch faces.  You can lock the watch face change you've selected tapping the padlock (closing it). If you tap the padlock again (opening it) you could change the watch face.

title: What's with the lock?

author: Darlene Hull
comment: Can only access one image from each set. And not the ones I want!

reply.author: SimplesApps
reply.content: Hello Darlene, the app uses the interactive functionality to change the watch face tapping anywhere in the screen except in the padlock. Every pack contains many different watch faces.  You can lock the watch face change you've selected tapping the padlock (closing it). If you tap the padlock again (opening it) you could change the watch face.

author: Sam Harper
comment: Great customer service too, as I was to thick to work out how to use it, thanks again David, love this app makes me smile
title: Great little app!!

author: Joshua Schechter
comment: Made my morning! I like that you can switch faces from the watch! Many nice looking faces. Since are just OK, but so many choices for a little over a buck. 👍👌
title: Nice!

author: Andrew Jenkins
comment: Very pleased, had a simple question for the re seller and had a response within the hour - excellent!

reply.author: SimplesApps
reply.content: Hi June, as you can see the app consist of a set of 60 different Christmas watch faces for smartwatches.
